授業目的: Students will work on extending their fluency of expression through activities centred around a topics-based syllabus. Critical thinking with a cross-cultural perspective will be fostered on a range of topical issues to do with lifestyles, customs and behaviour, with the intention of raising student awareness of aspects of their own culture and similarities or differences in other cultures. Vocabulary work will seek to broaden understanding of collocation patterns and familiarity with idiomatic language.
到達目標: Students will be trained to express their opinions in short speeches. Writing practice will include personal and business letter writing, journal writing, and the process involved in writing outlines, drafting, editing and revising essays.
